answers.answer: Call your doctor's office or go to the emergency room.
My doctor is closed and if I go to the er they want treat me as being pregnant so my blood pressure isn't high enough for them to treat it
You should relax drink plenty of water and take Tylenol for the headache as for the rest I found sweets help me so try something sweet

Does your doctors office have an emergency number you can call?Has this happened to you before during your pregnancy?  I am wondering about this since you state how the er will treat you.This BP value is dangerously high and you need treatment.  Is it possible yu are dehydrated?

I drink water all the time. When I went to the hospital they told me that I wasn't far enough along to treat as being pregnant that you have to be 20 weeks and that my blood pressure wasn't very high.
I went to the ER a few weeks ago when I was about 14 weeks pregnant and they treated me as being pregnant. It's BS that they won't treat you the same way. Maybe try a different ER?

You sound like you have a migraine. I get them a lot. Also I kknow that feeling of the ER not treating you like you are pregnant. I would still call your Dr office and have the Dr paged. I had Preeclampsia with my first pregnancy and my blood pressure was 200's/100's. I hope you don't get to that. Try to rest in a dark room with a cool cloth on your head. Hope you feel better.

Call the oncall doctor at your practice. Or go into the er and tell them you are worried about pre-eclampsia. Make them do labs. Anything over 140/90 for either number is too high. Do you have any vision changes? Headaches are a symptom.
They can't not take into consideration that you're pregnant- that would be malpractice easily and I would remind them of that. You need to be seen by someone mama. Don't wait!

Go to the ER honey! Same thing happened to me and they said this was a very serious issue! My blood pressure was over 140. Anytime it's over 140 and your pregnant it's a serious issue. I think u should go to the hospital. They will give you IV'S that will help. I was really close to getting induced because of my severe headache & vomiting and high blood pressure. Sorry don't mean to scare you but I am just worried for you and your baby! Good luck and bless you and your little one.
I'm 35 weeks with a history of preeclampsia. My bp has risen over the past 5 weeks to 148/96. My doctors office has yet to do anything about it either. Even with my headaches and swelling. Good luck
I have an appointment with my doctor tomorrow, they said just to rest and stay in bed until tomorrow
That's crazy that they said that. My doctor was so worried and told me to go to the ER immediately.

question: My blood pressure has been 148/85 what do I need to do? My head is hurting and I shake for no reason and get sick to my stomach I'm 13 weeks and 4 days
title: Blood pressure please help!!!!
